Reporter¶

The module of reporter.

class autodse.reporter.Reporter(config: Dict[str, Any], db: autodse.database.Database)¶

Main reporter class

config¶

DSE configurartion.

db¶

Database.

anime_ptr¶

The pointer to the current animation character.

is_first_best¶

Indicate if the best log header has been printed.

best_quality¶

The so far best quality.

draw_pareto_curve(out_filename: str) → None¶

Draw level 2 (HLS) result distribution and a Pareto curve.

Parameters

out_filename -- The output filename.

find_pareto_set(_data: List[Tuple[float, float, autodse.result.Result]]) → List[Tuple[float, float, autodse.result.Result]]¶

Identify the Pareto set in given results.

Parameters

_data -- All available data with performance and resource as the first two values.

Returns

A list of Pareto point results.

log_best() → None¶

Log the new best result if available

log_config(mode: str) → None¶

Log important configs

print_status(timer: float, count: int, phase: int = 1) → None¶

Pretty print the current exploration status.

Parameters

  • timer -- The elapsed time for exploration. If timer is a negative number than we are at phase 2 which has no exploration time limitation.

  • count -- The number of explored points.

  • phase -- The phase we are working on. Must be either 1 or 2.

report_output(outputs: List[autodse.result.Result]) → str¶

Report the final output.

Parameters

outputs -- A list results to be reported and outputed.

Returns

The output report.

report_summary() → Tuple[str, str]¶

Summarize the explored points in the DB.

Returns

The summary report.
